text:
Hi Edvin, 
Firstly apologies for the delay in getting back to you, I'm not sure if Penny let you know I was off on annual leave 
It's great to meet you and I hope I can help you in some way! As you know I've an animation background, most of my interactions with Post Production houses have been through animation. I've coordinated the post production pipeline for animation shows, so I'm familiar with onlines, final mixes, QC's, delivery, etc but I haven't worked with VFX.

I'm happy to have a call and maybe we can figure out what experience I have that could be helpful, I don't have any experience in advertising so I'll probably learn from you too :slightly_smiling_face:
